title: EP 92 Sharks and Demons
itunes:title: EP 92 Sharks and Demons
description:
On this episode we have music veteran Stan Sheppard who has managed everyone from Battlecat and DJ Quik, to Suga Free and the late great Mausberg. He discusses the robbery, deception and murder involved in urban music, We also touch on his relationship with Harry-O, his business dealings with Suge Knight and the Satanism that runs rampant in rap music.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
